simplesocial.server

Class PostDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplesocial.server.PostDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Remote, Updater

    public class PostDispatcher
extends Object
implements Updater
    This class manages the subscriptions to User's publications (followings). Implements Updater interface.
    Author:
    Francesco Landolfi

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public boolean register(Follower follower,
                        String username,
                        int oAuth)
                 throws RemoteException
        Registers username to the server (if oAuth is valid). A registered User will be notified trough the follower callback. If a User is successfully registered, it will receive all unread message it received while it was offline.
        Specified by:
        register in interface Updater
        Parameters:
        follower - the User's callback
        username - the User's name
        oAuth - the User's authorization token
        Returns:
        true if registered, false otherwise
        Throws:
        RemoteException - communication-related exception

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister(String username)
        Unregisters username (remove its callback from the database).
        Parameters:
        username - the User to unregister
        Returns:
        true if the User is unregistered, false if an error occurs

      • follow

        public ErrorCode follow(String username,
                        String followerName,
                        int oAuth)
                 throws RemoteException
        Makes followerName follow username (if oAuth is valid). Returns an ErrorCode, which can have one of the following values:
        • ErrorCode.SUCCESS, if username is now followed by followerName;
        • ErrorCode.TARGET_USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST, if the User to follow is not found in the UsersDB;
        • ErrorCode.USER_NOT_LOGGED, if followerName and oAuth credentials are not valid or expired.
        Specified by:
        follow in interface Updater
        Parameters:
        username - the User to be followed
        followerName - the follower's name
        oAuth - the follower's authorization token
        Returns:
        an ErrorCode
        Throws:
        RemoteException - communication-related exception

      • sendUpdate

        public boolean sendUpdate(String followerName,
                          Post post)
                   throws RemoteException
        Sends a Post to followerName through its callback.
        Parameters:
        followerName - the name of the User
        post - the Post to send
        Returns:
        true if the Post has been sent, false otherwise
        Throws:
        RemoteException - communication-related exception

      • post

        public void post(User poster,
                 String content)
          throws RemoteException
        Sends a Post to all poster's followers.
        Parameters:
        poster - the name of the sender User
        content - the content of the Post to be sent
        Throws:
        RemoteException - communication-related exception
